text: Eyes wide open in the dark we roam Lost in space searching for a home
Distressed call echoes fear in our hearts A vessel tearing us apart
Heart beat pounding my dread and foes A lone terror lurking nobody knows
Every breath we take steps towards the end of all Invasion, imbalance, humanity dethroned
Engines roaring faster than the speed of light Loved in a battle hole
Fighting the fight, survival instincts Kick it till I give
Against all odds, a curse of fear
